dir.name: [B]THIS CONTENT IS ABOUT PROVIDING INFORMATION TO YOU. HIGHLIGHT ITEM BUT DO NOT SELECT ITEM, SOME ITEMS SCROLL .... JUST LIKE THIS .... [/B]

[COLOR aqua]Keep updated ..... on issues affecting OpenView service ..... check your test video plays ..... if test video plays check your internet connection .....[/COLOR][COLOR lime] contact openviewhelp@gmail.com .....[/COLOR][COLOR aqua] Enjoy ..... [/COLOR]
[COLOR magenta]MAGENTA = SEVERE[/COLOR] ... [COLOR yellow]YELLOW = MODERATE[/COLOR] ... [COLOR lime]GREEN = INFO[/COLOR]
[COLOR aqua]23rd May .... Fixed two issues below, your system will automatically update. If backdrops are missing press 'c' on keyboard for context menu and refresh item, takes a while. [/COLOR]
[COLOR magenta]22nd May .... SEVERE .... Unable to watch TV shows? ....Getting script errors when TV show selected? Issue is being worked on.... [/COLOR]
[COLOR lime]20th May .... INFO .... Some backdrop fanart and movie images may not be showing up .... the issue is being worked on....[/COLOR]

[COLOR lime]3rd May .... INFO .... Not finding latest TV programmes? .... Try TV Latest under Mash Up and select Newmyvideolinks ..... BillionUploads normally works on third attempt ...... Movreel normally works ..... 180Upload and Hugefiles no recommended coz horrible Captchas ....[/COLOR]
[COLOR lime]19th April .... Recommendation .... Super Search on MashUp is amazing, it can take a bit of time. Your searches will also be saved to make things easier[/COLOR]
[COLOR magenta]9th April .... Mash up, iWatchOnline can cause reboot ..... [/COLOR]
[COLOR yellow]8th April .... 1Channel search does not work .... use Mash Up Super Search ....[/COLOR]
[COLOR yellow]30th March .... EarthCam .... Only Featured CAMS working .... [/COLOR]
[COLOR lime]24th March .... IMPORTANT .... [COLOR aqua]UPDATE TO VERSION 1.0.10 NOW[/COLOR] .... SEE OPENVIEW HOWTO VIDEO ....[/COLOR]
[COLOR lime]20th Feb .... MashUp .... BillionUploads server works on third attempt .... HugeFiles server issuing captchas, just try a few times and they will go[/COLOR]
[COLOR lime]18th Feb .... General .... Buffering is more likely at weekends (Sundays!) because of heavier traffic.[/COLOR]
[COLOR lime]10th Jan .... Recommendation .... Hackermils on MashUp, Freshout is a great starting point[/COLOR]
[COLOR lime]10th Jan .... Recommendation .... The New Pirate Bay on MashUp, Best of British is a fantastic collection of content[/COLOR]
Coming Soon ... [COLOR aqua](video - click to view - its a bit of fun lol!)[/COLOR]
